manifest.install: CREATE TABLE `ims_tech_reminder_form` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(32) unsigned NOT NULL, `wtitle` text, `wenabled` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `stitle` text, `sthumb` text, `sdesc` text, `surl` text, `senabled` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `number` int(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 ROW_FORMAT=DYNAMIC;
